statements: DELETE FROM sleep_patterns WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM sleep_patterns WHERE athlete_id = 5 AND date = '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM sleep_patterns WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM sleep_patterns WHERE total_sleep_hrs > 7.5 OR (sleep_quality_rating > 7 AND is_nap_taken = TRUE);
DELETE FROM SleepPattern WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM Athlete WHERE team = 'Cyclists';
DELETE FROM SleepPattern WHERE id = 1 AND athlete_id = 101;
DELETE FROM Athlete WHERE team = 'Team Alpha';
DELETE FROM sleep_records WHERE hours_slept < 6;
DELETE FROM recovery_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND recovery_rating < 4;
DELETE FROM sleep_records WHERE hours_slept < 6.5 AND sleep_quality < 3;
DELETE FROM recovery_data WHERE recovery_rating >= 3 AND workout_intensity > 5;
DELETE FROM RecoveryStats WHERE recovery_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SleepPatterns WHERE sleep_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM RecoveryStats WHERE recovery_date = '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM RestData WHERE rest_duration > 8 AND rest_quality < 3;
DELETE FROM athlete_sleep_patterns WHERE athlete_id = 1;
DELETE FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
DELETE FROM athlete_sleep_patterns WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2021-09-15';
DELETE FROM athlete_activities WHERE calories_burned > 500 AND activity_type = 'Cardio';
